channel.title: intro on Jimmy's Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in intro on Jimmy's Homepage

item.title: Personal Blog
item.description: Overview This is personal blog power by hugo hosted on github pages Setup procedure Follow the steps in Hugo - Quick Start On MacBook install hugo brew install hugo Create a new personal blog site hugo new site zshen-blog Choose a theme, and add it as submodule git submodule add https://github.com/rhazdon/hugo-theme-hello-friend-ng.git themes/hello-friend-ng Copy the exampleSite files into git repo root folder, remove the existing posts cp themes/hello-friend-ng/exampleSite/* ./ rm content/posts/* Create a new post
